definitions.definition: To be violent , with winds of 119 km/h (74 miles per hour) or greater, usually accompanied by rain , lightning , and thunder .
To move noisily , quickly , and dramatically , becoming the center of attention .
To attempt to accomplish a great deal with a frenzied effort .
To tear apart in a violent, destructive , and/or chaotic manner.
To storm excessivly; to fume and rage violently.
To chase violently or rush after and force along.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive , of the weather ) To be violent , with winds of 119 km/h (74 miles per hour) or greater, usually accompanied by rain , lightning , and thunder .

To tear apart in a violent, destructive , and/or chaotic manner.
To storm excessivly; to fume and rage violently.
To chase violently or rush after and force along.
